name: Knex + MySQL 最小
description: Knex で MySQL に接続し簡易テーブル操作。

files.template:
const knex = require('knex')({ client: 'mysql2', connection: '{{mysql_uri}}' });
(async () => { const exists = await knex.schema.hasTable('items'); if (!exists) { await knex.schema.createTable('items', t=>{ t.increments('id'); t.string('name'); }); } await knex('items').insert({ name: 'hello' }); const [{ c }] = await knex('items').count({ c: '*' }); console.log('count', c); await knex.destroy(); })();
